GapFillDragDrop.Title: was/were: questions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct question to each answer.

Content.Question:
1. Where were you yesterday?
I was in London.
2. Where were you born?
I was born in Manchester.
3. Was the man dangerous?
Yes, he was.
4. How many people were in class today?
There were twenty-five people.
5. How old was Caroline’s sister?
She was eighteen.
6. How old were they?
They were thirty.
7. Were the children happy?
Yes, they were.
8. How many buildings were new?
Five.
9. Was it an interesting city?
No, it wasn’t.
10. Where were your brothers born?
They were born in France.
